channel.title: 508 server fishing spot
channel.description:
Hello can anyone tell how to add the fish spot to 508 server? like when u use lobster cageon it ,like after every 3 sec you will get xp + manta ray. :mad:
[u][b]with big regartz.[/b][/u] [i][b]Thank You.[/b][/i]

item.title: 508 server fishing spot
item.dc:creator: @gangzta gangzta
item.description:
@gangzta wrote:

how exactly can i put lvl, item requirments etc. at NPCOption1?br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 19, 2009, 10:16:05 am[/size][hr]how exactly can i put lvl, item requirments etc. at NPCOption1?

Read full topic

item.title: 508 server fishing spot
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Well in NPCOption 1, you’d need to add a delay, a level requirement and an item requirement.

In npcspawn, you’d need to add a few fishing spots.

In npclist, you’d need to add the fishing spots in.

Read full topic
